author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: toBufferedImage() didn't actually transfer the image data at all.

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: Avoid directly encoding if the sample model is not exactly right. For example, monochrome image generated by JAI (error-diffusion rasterization) use a non-packed sample model which caused badly encoded images.

msg: Corrects wrong link to Release Docs for 2.2.1.1
